doc.title: Ballroom Dancing Intermediate
doc.plot: By popular demand this series continues with the Intermediate level of Ballroom Dancing and is designed for all ages and for those who have already mastered the BeginnerÂ¹s level. Learn one-on-one, step-by-step with Teresa, as she takes you through the techniques of the most popular dances. Featured dances include: Fox Trot, Cha-Cha, Tango, Waltz, Rumba and Swing.
